title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
**Product Title:** COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6 Stainless Steel Trays and Digital Touch-Control LED Display

**Product Description:**

Take your food dehydration to the next level with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. This large capacity dehydrator features 6 stainless steel trays, providing 6.48ft² of drying space, allowing you to dehydrate multiple foods at once. The dehydrator is designed in California and powered by a 600W rear fan that circulates hot air for even drying.

**Key Features:**

- Large drying space: 6.48ft² with 6 stainless steel trays
- Digital Touch-Control LED Display for easy temperature control (95°–165°F)
- Hot air circulation from the rear fan for even drying
- Timer: 48 hours for set-and-forget operation
- Quiet operation: <48dB
- Safety features: Auto-shutoff and overheat protection
- Dishwasher-safe trays for easy cleaning
- Glass door for easy monitoring
- Memory function to store your favorite settings
- Extends shelf life of dehydrated foods

**Additional Accessories:**

- 1 x Mesh Screen (10.7 x 11.8 in)
- 1 x Fruit Roll Sheet (11.3 x 12.8 in)
- 50 included recipes to get you started

**Technical Specifications:**

- Power Rating: 600W
- Voltage: 120V
- Frequency: 60Hz
- Applicable Regions: USA and Canada
- Dimensions: Not specified (check the packaging for details)

**Order Now and Start Dehydrating Your Favorite Foods!**

Add the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky to your kitchen today and start enjoying healthy, homemade snacks like jerky, fruit leather, and more. Order now and take advantage of our competitive pricing and excellent customer service.
